name: Fly to hope
description:
You are a survivor in post-apocalyptic world. You have been searching parts for your airplane. Only 3 of them left but your journey will be hard. You have a shotgun but you are out of ammuniton kill bandits and monsters to collect rubbishes and craft ammo. Explore mines and sewers.


-Pass deadly traps





-fight with terrifying bosses




-fight with bandits
